title: Richard Dawkins | Actor, Writer, Producer
snippet: Richard Dawkins was born on 26 March 1941 in Nairobi, Kenya. He is an actor and writer, known for Doctor Who (2005), Expelled: No Intelligence Allowed (2008) and The Simpsons (1989). He has been married to Lalla Ward since September 1992.
